content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":259252,"originalJapaneseLine":"エールは、日光とカオスの所有者になった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Earl became the owner of Nichiko and Chaos."},{"lineNumber":259253,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだ、こいつは・・とカオスが驚く","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is this guy...\" Chaos is surprised."},{"lineNumber":259254,"originalJapaneseLine":"法王クルックーさんとランスの子供よ。","translatedEnglishLine":"He is the child of Pope Krukku and Lance."},{"lineNumber":259255,"originalJapaneseLine":"なにぃ、ランスの子だと・・むむむ、ん？？","translatedEnglishLine":"What, Lance's child...? Hmmm, huh??"},{"lineNumber":259256,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　意味深くらいで　カオスは創造神とは気がついてないが何か特別な者というのは分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos senses there is some deeper meaning but doesn’t realize this is the Creator God, only that it is someone special."},{"lineNumber":259257,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259258,"originalJapaneseLine":"で、どうするの","translatedEnglishLine":"So, what will you do?"},{"lineNumber":259259,"originalJapaneseLine":"目的は達した、決勝に参加する必要はないといえばない","translatedEnglishLine":"The goal has been reached; you could say there’s no need to participate in the finals."},{"lineNumber":259260,"originalJapaneseLine":"勝って闘神になっても、式典とかめんどくさいよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if we win and become the Fighting God, the ceremonies and such are a hassle."},{"lineNumber":259261,"originalJapaneseLine":"私達の目的は、魔王ランスに勝負を挑む事だからね","translatedEnglishLine":"Our purpose is to challenge the Demon Lord Lance."},{"lineNumber":259262,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザンス、俺はアレキサンダーに負けたが、実力では負けていないはずだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Zansu, I lost to Alexander, but it shouldn’t be because of skill."},{"lineNumber":259263,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんかよくわからんうちに負けてしまった、調子が悪かったのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"I somehow lost before I knew it; I wasn’t in good form."},{"lineNumber":259264,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前なら楽勝で勝てるさ、やる必要もないくらいにな","translatedEnglishLine":"If it’s you, you can win easily, no need to even try much."},{"lineNumber":259265,"originalJapaneseLine":"コロシアム","translatedEnglishLine":"Coliseum."},{"lineNumber":259266,"originalJapaneseLine":"決勝戦のアナウンス。","translatedEnglishLine":"Announcement of the final match."},{"lineNumber":259267,"originalJapaneseLine":"アレキサンダーが現れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alexander appears."},{"lineNumber":259268,"originalJapaneseLine":"エールはカオスか日光が悩んだが、今回はカオスを持って現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Earl hesitated between Chaos and Nichiko but appeared with Chaos this time."},{"lineNumber":259269,"originalJapaneseLine":"　始めて使うカオスだが、それでも勝てると甘く見ている","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s Earl's first time using Chaos, but he is overly confident he can still win."},{"lineNumber":259270,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カオスの使い方の練習程度に","translatedEnglishLine":"More like practicing how to use Chaos."},{"lineNumber":259271,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カオスが注意する、甘くみないほうがいいぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos warns him, it’s better not to underestimate."},{"lineNumber":259272,"originalJapaneseLine":"控え室","translatedEnglishLine":"Waiting room."},{"lineNumber":259273,"originalJapaneseLine":"シュリさんとアレキサンダーのパートナーが居る","translatedEnglishLine":"Shuri-san and Alexander’s partner are present."},{"lineNumber":259274,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、いつまで立ってもエールは現れなかった","translatedEnglishLine":"However, Earl never showed up no matter how long they waited."},{"lineNumber":259275,"originalJapaneseLine":"負けた場合・・","translatedEnglishLine":"If they lose..."},{"lineNumber":259276,"originalJapaneseLine":"アレキサンダーに教訓を受ける","translatedEnglishLine":"They receive a lesson from Alexander."},{"lineNumber":259277,"originalJapaneseLine":"街道を歩くエール達","translatedEnglishLine":"Earl and others walk along the highway."},{"lineNumber":259278,"originalJapaneseLine":"闘神大会の感想を話しながら進む・・","translatedEnglishLine":"They proceed while discussing their impressions of the Fighting God tournament..."},{"lineNumber":259279,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一般人は邪魔だな、今度、俺達がみんな参加してやりたいな","translatedEnglishLine":"Common people are a nuisance; next time, we all want to participate."},{"lineNumber":259280,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ミックス、私が出ていたら私が優勝していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Mix, if I had entered, I would have won."},{"lineNumber":259281,"originalJapaneseLine":"　元就、予選の日、酒かっくらって寝ていて失格になった、今度は勝ちたい","translatedEnglishLine":"Motonari got disqualified for getting drunk and sleeping on the day of preliminaries; he wants to win next time."},{"lineNumber":259282,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リセット、あの闘神大会、何か怪しげな裏がありそう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset feels the Fighting God tournament had some suspicious behind-the-scenes."},{"lineNumber":259283,"originalJapaneseLine":"　女性を見世物にしているし、パートナーの女性が何名も行方不明になっている","translatedEnglishLine":"Women are being made spectacles of, and several female partners have gone missing."},{"lineNumber":259284,"originalJapaneseLine":"　都市長のＹＯＲＡという人がとても怪しい","translatedEnglishLine":"The city mayor named YORA seems very suspicious."},{"lineNumber":259285,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ま、今の自分達には関係ない","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, it doesn’t concern us right now."},{"lineNumber":259286,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれからエール達は・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Since then, Earl and the others..."},{"lineNumber":259287,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＸＸ月Ｘ日　？？？","translatedEnglishLine":"XX month X day ???"},{"lineNumber":259288,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＸＸ月Ｘ日　？？？","translatedEnglishLine":"XX month X day ???"},{"lineNumber":259289,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＸＸ月Ｘ日　？？？","translatedEnglishLine":"XX month X day ???"},{"lineNumber":259291,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259292,"originalJapaneseLine":"５つのオーブが揃い、６通の紹介状も渡し終え、","translatedEnglishLine":"With the five orbs gathered and six letters of introduction handed out,"},{"lineNumber":259293,"originalJapaneseLine":"エールと同じランスの血を引く仲間達を集めた","translatedEnglishLine":"They assembled comrades who share Lance’s bloodline like Earl."},{"lineNumber":259294,"originalJapaneseLine":"準備は整ったはずだ、だが、確実とは思えなかった","translatedEnglishLine":"The preparations should be complete, but certainty was lacking."},{"lineNumber":259295,"originalJapaneseLine":"その不安な気持ちが、あちらこちらへ寄り道冒険をさせた","translatedEnglishLine":"That uneasy feeling caused them to detour and have adventures here and there."},{"lineNumber":259296,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、いつまでもそれを続けている訳にはいかない","translatedEnglishLine":"However, they cannot keep doing that forever."},{"lineNumber":259297,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが言う、翔竜山にいこう、魔王ランスを倒そう","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone says, ‘Let’s go to Mount Shoryu and defeat Demon Lord Lance.’"},{"lineNumber":259298,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうだ、いつまでも迷っていては駄目だ","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s right, we can’t keep hesitating."},{"lineNumber":259299,"originalJapaneseLine":"やらねばいけない。","translatedEnglishLine":"We must do it."},{"lineNumber":259300,"originalJapaneseLine":"これまで努力してきたんだ、きっと成功する","translatedEnglishLine":"We’ve worked hard until now; surely we will succeed."},{"lineNumber":259301,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてボク達は、翔竜山の麓に再び現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"And then, we appeared again at the foot of Mount Shoryu."},{"lineNumber":259302,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、エール達から少し離れた場所","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, at a place a little distance from Earl and the others,"},{"lineNumber":259303,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックー、シーラ、マジック、リア、香姫、","translatedEnglishLine":"Krukku, Sheila, Magic, Ria, Koki,"},{"lineNumber":259304,"originalJapaneseLine":"　他何名かのお供　各国からの護衛兵　全部合わせても５０名ほど","translatedEnglishLine":"and some other attendants, bodyguards from various countries; altogether about 50 people."},{"lineNumber":259305,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259306,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんか子供達の遠足を見ている、父兄参観風","translatedEnglishLine":"It looks like watching children's field trip, a kind of parents' observation atmosphere."},{"lineNumber":259307,"originalJapaneseLine":"さぁ、我々も準備しましょう。きっと子供達は成功してくれます","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, let us prepare too. Surely the children will succeed."},{"lineNumber":259308,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、気をつけてね、その箱には人類の命運がかかっているのだから","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, be careful, because the fate of humanity rests in that box."},{"lineNumber":259309,"originalJapaneseLine":"１．５メートル四方の大きな木箱を１０名ほどの兵士が大切に担いでついて来ている","translatedEnglishLine":"About ten soldiers carefully carry and follow a large wooden box measuring 1.5 meters square."},{"lineNumber":259310,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　この時点では木箱を一緒に運んでいるという情報だけ伝わればいいです","translatedEnglishLine":"At this point, it’s enough to convey that they are carrying the wooden box together."},{"lineNumber":259311,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　中身＝氷柱シィルですがユーザーには内緒です、運んでいる兵士も知りません","translatedEnglishLine":"The contents are Ice Pillar Sil, but it’s a secret to the user; even the soldiers carrying it do not know."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは、日光とカオスの所有者になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Earl became the owner of Nichiko and Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、こいつは・・とカオスが驚く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What is this guy..." Chaos is surprised.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 法王クルックーさんとランスの子供よ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is the child of Pope Krukku and Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにぃ、ランスの子だと・・むむむ、ん？？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, Lance's child...? Hmmm, huh??

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意味深くらいで　カオスは創造神とは気がついてないが何か特別な者というのは分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos senses there is some deeper meaning but doesn’t realize this is the Creator God, only that it is someone special.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、どうするの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, what will you do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目的は達した、決勝に参加する必要はないといえばない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The goal has been reached; you could say there’s no need to participate in the finals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝って闘神になっても、式典とかめんどくさいよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if we win and become the Fighting God, the ceremonies and such are a hassle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達の目的は、魔王ランスに勝負を挑む事だからね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our purpose is to challenge the Demon Lord Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンス、俺はアレキサンダーに負けたが、実力では負けていないはずだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu, I lost to Alexander, but it shouldn’t be because of skill.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんかよくわからんうちに負けてしまった、調子が悪かったのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I somehow lost before I knew it; I wasn’t in good form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前なら楽勝で勝てるさ、やる必要もないくらいにな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it’s you, you can win easily, no need to even try much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Coliseum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決勝戦のアナウンス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Announcement of the final match.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダーが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alexander appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールはカオスか日光が悩んだが、今回はカオスを持って現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Earl hesitated between Chaos and Nichiko but appeared with Chaos this time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 始めて使うカオスだが、それでも勝てると甘く見ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s Earl's first time using Chaos, but he is overly confident he can still win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスの使い方の練習程度に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More like practicing how to use Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスが注意する、甘くみないほうがいいぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos warns him, it’s better not to underestimate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控え室
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Waiting room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シュリさんとアレキサンダーのパートナーが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shuri-san and Alexander’s partner are present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、いつまで立ってもエールは現れなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Earl never showed up no matter how long they waited.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負けた場合・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they lose...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダーに教訓を受ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They receive a lesson from Alexander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街道を歩くエール達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Earl and others walk along the highway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神大会の感想を話しながら進む・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They proceed while discussing their impressions of the Fighting God tournament...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一般人は邪魔だな、今度、俺達がみんな参加してやりたいな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Common people are a nuisance; next time, we all want to participate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミックス、私が出ていたら私が優勝していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mix, if I had entered, I would have won.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元就、予選の日、酒かっくらって寝ていて失格になった、今度は勝ちたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Motonari got disqualified for getting drunk and sleeping on the day of preliminaries; he wants to win next time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット、あの闘神大会、何か怪しげな裏がありそう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset feels the Fighting God tournament had some suspicious behind-the-scenes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女性を見世物にしているし、パートナーの女性が何名も行方不明になっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Women are being made spectacles of, and several female partners have gone missing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 都市長のＹＯＲＡという人がとても怪しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The city mayor named YORA seems very suspicious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、今の自分達には関係ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it doesn’t concern us right now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれからエール達は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since then, Earl and the others...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸ月Ｘ日　？？？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: XX month X day ???

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸ月Ｘ日　？？？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: XX month X day ???

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸ月Ｘ日　？？？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: XX month X day ???

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸ月Ｘ日　？？？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: XX month X day ???

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５つのオーブが揃い、６通の紹介状も渡し終え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With the five orbs gathered and six letters of introduction handed out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールと同じランスの血を引く仲間達を集めた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They assembled comrades who share Lance’s bloodline like Earl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 準備は整ったはずだ、だが、確実とは思えなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The preparations should be complete, but certainty was lacking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その不安な気持ちが、あちらこちらへ寄り道冒険をさせた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That uneasy feeling caused them to detour and have adventures here and there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、いつまでもそれを続けている訳にはいかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, they cannot keep doing that forever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが言う、翔竜山にいこう、魔王ランスを倒そう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says, ‘Let’s go to Mount Shoryu and defeat Demon Lord Lance.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、いつまでも迷っていては駄目だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s right, we can’t keep hesitating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やらねばいけない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must do it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまで努力してきたんだ、きっと成功する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ve worked hard until now; surely we will succeed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてボク達は、翔竜山の麓に再び現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then, we appeared again at the foot of Mount Shoryu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、エール達から少し離れた場所
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, at a place a little distance from Earl and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックー、シーラ、マジック、リア、香姫、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukku, Sheila, Magic, Ria, Koki,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他何名かのお供　各国からの護衛兵　全部合わせても５０名ほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and some other attendants, bodyguards from various countries; altogether about 50 people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか子供達の遠足を見ている、父兄参観風
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like watching children's field trip, a kind of parents' observation atmosphere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さぁ、我々も準備しましょう。きっと子供達は成功してくれます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, let us prepare too. Surely the children will succeed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、気をつけてね、その箱には人類の命運がかかっているのだから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, be careful, because the fate of humanity rests in that box.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １．５メートル四方の大きな木箱を１０名ほどの兵士が大切に担いでついて来ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About ten soldiers carefully carry and follow a large wooden box measuring 1.5 meters square.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この時点では木箱を一緒に運んでいるという情報だけ伝わればいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, it’s enough to convey that they are carrying the wooden box together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中身＝氷柱シィルですがユーザーには内緒です、運んでいる兵士も知りません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The contents are Ice Pillar Sil, but it’s a secret to the user; even the soldiers carrying it do not know.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは、日光とカオスの所有者になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Earl became the owner of Nichiko and Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、こいつは・・とカオスが驚く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What is this guy..." Chaos is surprised.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 法王クルックーさんとランスの子供よ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is the child of Pope Krukku and Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにぃ、ランスの子だと・・むむむ、ん？？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, Lance's child...? Hmmm, huh??

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意味深くらいで　カオスは創造神とは気がついてないが何か特別な者というのは分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos senses there is some deeper meaning but doesn’t realize this is the Creator God, only that it is someone special.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、どうするの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, what will you do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目的は達した、決勝に参加する必要はないといえばない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The goal has been reached; you could say there’s no need to participate in the finals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝って闘神になっても、式典とかめんどくさいよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if we win and become the Fighting God, the ceremonies and such are a hassle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達の目的は、魔王ランスに勝負を挑む事だからね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our purpose is to challenge the Demon Lord Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンス、俺はアレキサンダーに負けたが、実力では負けていないはずだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu, I lost to Alexander, but it shouldn’t be because of skill.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんかよくわからんうちに負けてしまった、調子が悪かったのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I somehow lost before I knew it; I wasn’t in good form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前なら楽勝で勝てるさ、やる必要もないくらいにな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it’s you, you can win easily, no need to even try much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Coliseum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決勝戦のアナウンス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Announcement of the final match.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダーが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alexander appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールはカオスか日光が悩んだが、今回はカオスを持って現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Earl hesitated between Chaos and Nichiko but appeared with Chaos this time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 始めて使うカオスだが、それでも勝てると甘く見ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s Earl's first time using Chaos, but he is overly confident he can still win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスの使い方の練習程度に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More like practicing how to use Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスが注意する、甘くみないほうがいいぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos warns him, it’s better not to underestimate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控え室
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Waiting room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シュリさんとアレキサンダーのパートナーが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shuri-san and Alexander’s partner are present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、いつまで立ってもエールは現れなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Earl never showed up no matter how long they waited.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負けた場合・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they lose...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダーに教訓を受ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They receive a lesson from Alexander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街道を歩くエール達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Earl and others walk along the highway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神大会の感想を話しながら進む・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They proceed while discussing their impressions of the Fighting God tournament...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一般人は邪魔だな、今度、俺達がみんな参加してやりたいな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Common people are a nuisance; next time, we all want to participate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミックス、私が出ていたら私が優勝していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mix, if I had entered, I would have won.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元就、予選の日、酒かっくらって寝ていて失格になった、今度は勝ちたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Motonari got disqualified for getting drunk and sleeping on the day of preliminaries; he wants to win next time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット、あの闘神大会、何か怪しげな裏がありそう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset feels the Fighting God tournament had some suspicious behind-the-scenes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女性を見世物にしているし、パートナーの女性が何名も行方不明になっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Women are being made spectacles of, and several female partners have gone missing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 都市長のＹＯＲＡという人がとても怪しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The city mayor named YORA seems very suspicious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、今の自分達には関係ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it doesn’t concern us right now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれからエール達は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since then, Earl and the others...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸ月Ｘ日　？？？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: XX month X day ???

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸ月Ｘ日　？？？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: XX month X day ???

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸ月Ｘ日　？？？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: XX month X day ???

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸ月Ｘ日　？？？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: XX month X day ???

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５つのオーブが揃い、６通の紹介状も渡し終え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With the five orbs gathered and six letters of introduction handed out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールと同じランスの血を引く仲間達を集めた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They assembled comrades who share Lance’s bloodline like Earl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 準備は整ったはずだ、だが、確実とは思えなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The preparations should be complete, but certainty was lacking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その不安な気持ちが、あちらこちらへ寄り道冒険をさせた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That uneasy feeling caused them to detour and have adventures here and there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、いつまでもそれを続けている訳にはいかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, they cannot keep doing that forever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが言う、翔竜山にいこう、魔王ランスを倒そう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says, ‘Let’s go to Mount Shoryu and defeat Demon Lord Lance.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、いつまでも迷っていては駄目だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s right, we can’t keep hesitating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やらねばいけない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must do it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまで努力してきたんだ、きっと成功する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ve worked hard until now; surely we will succeed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてボク達は、翔竜山の麓に再び現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then, we appeared again at the foot of Mount Shoryu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、エール達から少し離れた場所
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, at a place a little distance from Earl and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックー、シーラ、マジック、リア、香姫、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukku, Sheila, Magic, Ria, Koki,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他何名かのお供　各国からの護衛兵　全部合わせても５０名ほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and some other attendants, bodyguards from various countries; altogether about 50 people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか子供達の遠足を見ている、父兄参観風
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like watching children's field trip, a kind of parents' observation atmosphere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さぁ、我々も準備しましょう。きっと子供達は成功してくれます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, let us prepare too. Surely the children will succeed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、気をつけてね、その箱には人類の命運がかかっているのだから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, be careful, because the fate of humanity rests in that box.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １．５メートル四方の大きな木箱を１０名ほどの兵士が大切に担いでついて来ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About ten soldiers carefully carry and follow a large wooden box measuring 1.5 meters square.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この時点では木箱を一緒に運んでいるという情報だけ伝わればいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, it’s enough to convey that they are carrying the wooden box together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中身＝氷柱シィルですがユーザーには内緒です、運んでいる兵士も知りません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The contents are Ice Pillar Sil, but it’s a secret to the user; even the soldiers carrying it do not know.
